segments.text: I see the children working together to get cookies, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking a fall just to reach that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so patient, just waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is too distracted to notice anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making a huge puddle, and she’s standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to look up from that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s stool is wobbling, and it’s making me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl doesn’t seem to care about the danger, just the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman really needs to turn off that faucet before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
